short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lets see if you can count all the balls !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:

Count the balls appearing randomly on the screen and see if you can get it right!
